Donate

Citizens for Parks and Open Space Preservation is a privately funded grassroots committee of community volunteers leading the campaign to continue locally controlled funding to protect our area's incredible beaches, rivers, coastal areas, open space and wildlife habitat for posterity.

Our committee must rely entirely on private contributions for mailers, signs and other campaign communications, which are vital to a victory on Election Day. We can't win without generous community donations like yours!
